name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_18F
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "F" means the element "fluorine" and "18F" is the isotope "fluorine-18" with a half-life of 6.98e-02 days.
